summary: Allows keyboard hot keys to be used while using the 360 controller.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: Unless you have a use for using the shout key from the keyboard (like some kind of macro) there is no need to update to 1.0.1. It shouldn\'t harm anything either though.

360 Keyboard Hotkey Enabler
Created by: NVShacker
12/10/11

Description:
Allows hotkeys 1-8 in the favorites menu to be used from the keyboard while using an Xbox 360 controller with Skyrim. The keyboard key for shout is also enabled.

NOTE: Though 1 and 2 can be used with the keyboard with this, a somewhat less known feature is that they can also be used by holding D-PAD LEFT or D-PAD RIGHT in the favorites menu.

Installation Instructions:
Extract the contents of the archive to your Skyrim folder. For Steam users, that\'ll be your Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim folder.

Known Bugs:
None I\'ve had in play thus far, though it is possible you\'ll be able to use the favorite keys at times you\'re not supposed to.

Compatability:
This mod will override controlmap.txt, in Skyrims\\Data\\Interface\\PC\\controls so anything that changes that will be overridden. At present, that would be the excellent Interface Hard Coded Key Tweaks by crazy-g. If you wish to use both mods at once, manually editing controlmap.txt and replacing the lines between Hotkey1 and Hotkey8 with:
Hotkey1				0x02,0x4f			0xff	0x0004				0	0	0	
Hotkey2				0x03,0x50			0xff	0x0008				0	0	0	
Hotkey3				0x04,0x51			0xff	0xff				1	0	0	
Hotkey4				0x05,0x4b			0xff	0xff				1	0	0	
Hotkey5				0x06,0x4c			0xff	0xff				1	0	0	
Hotkey6				0x07,0x4d			0xff	0xff				1	0	0	
Hotkey7				0x08,0x47			0xff	0xff				1	0	0	
Hotkey8				0x09,0x48			0xff	0xff				1	0	0
Will allow hotkeys to be used with the 360 controller while it\'s in use.

Thanks:
crazy-g, for his interface mod, which made me aware of the existence of controlmap.txt

Changelog:
1.0.1 - enabled shout key
1.0.0 - initial release
author: NVShacker
